questions.requete_template: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM absence a JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON a.Inscription = ie.id JOIN eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id WHERE p.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND p.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}';

SELECT COUNT(a.id) AS nombre_absences FROM absence a JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON a.Inscription = ie.id JOIN eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id WHERE p.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND p.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}';
